name: Project Rapidfire
description:
This is my submission for the Game Maker's Toolkit 2017 Game Jam.  Link:  https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-jam

The theme involved dual-purpose design, where an action or a button can perform two or more actions at once.  An example in this game is that the mouse button can not only fire, but also reload depending on whether its pressed or released.  This also includes other effects.

The target platform is Windows, and was made in Game Maker Studio 1.4, though GraphicsGale and Bfxr were used in the creation of the visual and audio assets, respectively.

Instructions:

WASD to move
Mouse to aim and shoot
Hold left mouse button to maintain combo
Release to reload and reset combo
Press Enter to Start

The goal is to get as high of a combo as you can.
